body:
Well, I've been playing this server for years, before the "revamp". Basically back when it was still wallsmc. I kinda miss it, you know? Oh well. 

A bit about myself: I go to High school in the Bay Area, California. I swim for the EBSL and will soon be swimming for my high school, which I'm pretty excited about. My name is Evan and I'm 14, 15 in March. I also play the viola and really enjoy drawing. Pretty excited to be a part of this community, and see what it's all about :)
